Room.Name: Vickers House Library
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the dusty library of the Vickers household.
Room.LongDescription: Bookshelves extend from floor to ceiling on three walls of the room. The windows on the fourth wall are so covered with dust that you cannot see out. A large wooden desk, covered with a sheet, and a leather couch are the only furniture. It looks as though someone has been searching here. You see books scattered on the floor.
